import React from"react";import"./Zipper.css";import{serviceArea}from"../globalVars";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Steps=()=>{function handleChange(e){const answer=document.getElementById("answer");if(e.target.value.length===5){if(serviceArea.has(Number(e.target.value))){answer.innerText="Yes, we can help you!";answer.style.color="green";}else{answer.innerText="We don't service that area.";answer.style.color="rgb(140, 0, 0)";}}else{answer.innerText="";}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"zipper-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"zipper-background",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"zipper-elements",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{id:"question",children:"Do we service your area?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{id:"field",type:"field",placeholder:" Zip ",maxLength:5,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{id:"answer"})]})})});};export default Steps;
